posts.content:
So it looks like I'm moving house, which means a few more of my collection need to go I was keeping this OG paint pgsg project for myself but needs must so here it is folks:











Wolfsburg built mid-55 pgsg bus.
Euro spec semaphore & centre brake light bus.
Awesome fade Palm Green over Sand Green Original Paint.
Some white paint on the bus which comes off pretty easily without damaging the og paint & pinstripes, as does the surface rust if you're going for a cleaner look!
Very original bus with front & rear seats (needing some repair), original date stamped crows feet wheels in OG paint, uncut dash, most interior panels, rear lights, etc, etc.
OG front bumper & very nice painted rear bumper included.
Rust in the chassis - photos show it best, & lower 6" rust in floors, sills, doglegs, corners, trays, etc.
Doors & hatches are good. Lower repairs needed to cab doors.
Roof has some dents that should come out easily, plus a small split along one gutter, (see pics).
Needs all glass - now easily available as repro with all the correct stamps, semaphores - also available as repro, engine & metalwork. Roof rack not included in the sale.
Comes with dating letter & NOVA registration so all you need to get it registered in the UK, or to export elsewhere.

Â£12500 ono takes this very cool, very rare project. Bus is in Somerset (DT9).

More pics here: http://s1179.photobucket.com/user/busbe ... uro%20spec

Please call or PM with any questions, and feel free to come and view or to make an offer.

Thanks,

Ben
07742 408558
I have a front beam hanger chassis section available if you'd rather replace than repair too
Bus now pending. Thanks for looking.
